overview: Rodney Yee and Colleen Saidman-Yee deliver the most comprehensive Yoga DVD available to consumers. This DVD features not only a full length 30 minute Yoga Program, but an on-screen visual pose guide which serves as your personal tutorial. You'll have the option of selecting any of the 19 featured poses and then seeing it broken down step-by-step for truly easy learning.
title: Rodney Yee's Yoga For Beginners
